column4: how do i prevent a device driver from loading in ubuntu? i don't want to use my internal sound card as i have a PCMCIA one. also, tell me how to set the global default sound device, as just editing the prefs only affects my own profile.
why does it say unregged? i'm registered with nickserv!
did you identify to nickserv?
this isnt the place for that question
it isn't? i type /join #ubuntu and it sends me to #ubuntu-unregged
i figured it had to do with me being nickserv-regged or not.
yes, in fact that's why i rejoined just now.
i id'ed with it after joining, so i left and rejoined but it didnt work apparently
what? i'm identified with it!
then what's the issue?
why am i redirected to the unregged channel if i am regged?
well you seem to be here right now
my channel status line says #ubuntu-unregged >.>
what device do you need to disable
one of my sound cards, a SiS on-board sound card.
need more details?
and you want to disable it..?
that would probably disable your sound entirely
why would it? my PCMCIA sound card uses an entirely different kernel module.
oh okay.
i believe it was the other four-letter word for poop
